actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize States to enforce pipeline safety requirements related to wellbores at interstate storage facilities.
short_title: Underground Gas Storage Facility Safety Act of 2013

summary.text: Underground Gas Storage Facility Safety Act of 2013 - Revises federal pipeline safety requirements to authorize states to enforce state requirements for the safe construction and operation of underground gas storage wellbores and underground hazardous liquid storage wellbores if: (1) the requirement has been approved by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC), or (2) FERC fails to approve such requirement within 30 days after its submission.

titles.title: Underground Gas Storage Facility Safety Act of 2013
A bill to authorize States to enforce pipeline safety requirements related to wellbores at interstate storage facilities.
